```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
wavedata <- read_csv("wave-7dayopdata.csv", skip = 1)
```

```{r}
#| label: Northern Queensland Region

northern_queen <- wavedata %>%
  filter(Site == "Cairns Mk4",
         DateTime == "2025-04-26T19:00:00",
         DateTime == "2025-04-27T19:00:00",
         DateTime == "2025-04-28T19:00:00",
         DateTime == "2025-04-29T19:00:00",
         DateTime == "2025-04-30T19:00:00")

northern_queen
```

```{r}
#| label: Southern Queensland Region

southern_queen <- wavedata %>%
  filter(Site == "Gold Coast Mk4")
(southern_queen)
```

```{r}
wavedata %>%
  mutate(DateTime = lubridate::ymd_hms(format(DateTime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %T %Z")),
         date = date(DateTime)) %>% 
  group_by(date, Site) %>% 
  summarize(avg_wave = mean(Hsig, na.rm = TRUE))
```


```{r}
wavedata %>% 
  distinct(Site)
```
